Second Place: “Family”

Alameda County

Irvington High School

Filmmakers: Kexin Li and Vivian Liu

Advisor: Shiloh Burton

Language: Mandarin Chinese with English subtitles

A Chinese girl describes the cultural pressures of not being able to choose her own path and the strain it has on the relationship with her mother. Her mother realizes her daughter is struggling because of it and reaches out to her.
